name: In re ESTATE of Mary PETAJNIK, Deceased. Appeal of Anthony PETAJNIK et al.

judges: Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
parties: In re ESTATE of Mary PETAJNIK, Deceased. Appeal of Anthony PETAJNIK et al.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM.
Decree affirmed.
Appellants to bear costs.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Henry J. Albaugh, Aliquippa, for appellant.
Joseph Stanichak, Frank C. Lewis, Beaver Falls, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
353 A.2d 37
In re ESTATE of Mary PETAJNIK, Deceased. Appeal of Anthony PETAJNIK et al.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 22, 1975.
Decided March 17, 1976.
Henry J. Albaugh, Aliquippa, for appellant.
Joseph Stanichak, Frank C. Lewis, Beaver Falls, for appellee.
Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
